mapper.select: select sosc.*,ss.study_aspect from sybida_study ss right outer join (select so.*,sst.student_name,sst.student_sex,sc.class_num from sybida_offer so inner join sybida_student sst on so.offer_student_id=sst.student_id inner join sybida_class sc on sst.student_class_id=sc.class_id where so.offer_student_id = #{offerStudentId} and so.offer_isexist = 1) sosc on ss.study_id = sosc.offer_study_id

select sosc.*,ss.study_aspect from sybida_study ss right outer join (select so.*,sst.student_name,sst.student_sex,sc.class_num from sybida_offer so inner join sybida_student sst on so.offer_student_id=sst.student_id inner join sybida_class sc on sst.student_class_id=sc.class_id where so.offer_id = #{offerId}) sosc on ss.study_id = sosc.offer_study_id
